# <a name="add-emojis-or-gifs-in-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="183c4-102">Lisää emojeja tai GIF-tietoja Outlookin verkko versiossa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="183c4-102">Add emojis or GIFs in Outlook on the web</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="183c4-103">Vastaa aiemmin luotuun Sähkö posti viestiin tai valitse **Uusi viesti**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="183c4-103">Reply to an existing email or select **New message**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="183c4-104">Valitse hymiö</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="183c4-104">Select the smiley face</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="183c4-105">Avaa lauseke ruutu luo-ikkunan alareunassa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="183c4-105">at the bottom of the compose window to open the Expressions pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="183c4-106">Etsi ja valitse emoji tai GIF, jonka haluat lisätä.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="183c4-106">Search for and choose the emoji or GIF you want to insert.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="183c4-107">Lisä tietoja on Ohje aiheessa [Sähkö posti viestin mukauttaminen Outlookin verkko](https://support.office.com/article/079442eb-6b41-4ff5-b6e0-a83d3967ac41)versiossa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="183c4-107">For more information, see [Customize your email message in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/079442eb-6b41-4ff5-b6e0-a83d3967ac41).</span></span>
